FARCASTER_DRY_RUN.description: Enables or disables dry run mode when interacting with Farcaster; when true, operations are simulated but not executed.

FARCASTER_FID.description: The Farcaster FID (user identifier) used to publish or manage casts for a specific account.

MAX_CAST_LENGTH.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in a Farcaster cast.

FARCASTER_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in milliseconds for Farcaster operations such as fetching new casts.

ENABLE_POST.description: Enables or disables the ability to post casts to Farcaster.

POST_INTERVAL_MIN.description: Minimum interval in milliseconds between automated posts.

POST_INTERVAL_MAX.description: Maximum interval in milliseconds between automated posts.

ENABLE_ACTION_PROCESSING.description: Turns on or off automated action processing for Farcaster events.

ACTION_INTERVAL.description: Interval in milliseconds between action-processing cycles.

POST_IMMEDIATELY.description: If true, posts are published immediately instead of waiting for a schedule.

MAX_ACTIONS_PROCESSING.description: Maximum number of Farcaster actions to process in a single batch.

FARCASTER_SIGNER_UUID.description: UUID of the Neynar signer associated with the Farcaster account, required to sign casts.

FARCASTER_NEYNAR_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate with the Neynar Farcaster API.

FARCASTER_HUB_URL.description: Base URL for the Farcaster hub the client should communicate with.
